titleStmt.title: Synopsis communium locorum præcipue ad mores spectantium ex poetis Latinis tum antiquioribus tum recentioribus collecta et in capita curique propria digesta : in usum puerorum qui in scholis grammaticis poetarum latinorum tum lectione tum imitatione prima faciunt Tyrocinia.

publicationStmt.publisher: Typis Leon. Lichfield, Impensis Hen. Clements bibliopolæ,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
